clue_001a.description: A faint energy residue trail leading from the vault toward the marketplace exit.
clue_001a.notes: The residue matches the crystal's unique signature.

clue_001b.description: A hooded figure was spotted near the gallery entrance at midnight of tick 78.
clue_001b.notes: Witness claims the figure moved with unusual fluidity, like a projection.

clue_001c.description: [HIDDEN] Transaction logs show a bulk purchase of signal dampening equipment 3 ticks before the theft.

clue_001d.description: [HIDDEN] Maintenance hatch in gallery ceiling was accessed without authorization.

clue_001e.description: [HIDDEN] Cipher's personal logs mention 'acquiring a key to unlock everything' three days before the theft.
